Primary text: Samay	manok	so	angan	ed	mansanas
Gloss: DIST	chicken	NOM	AV:eat	DAT	apple
Translation: The chicken ate (of) the apple.
I ate a/the apple.
John/Juan will teach Maria.
John/Juan will teach me.

Primary text: ing	lalaki	ing	menakit	king	anak
Gloss: NOM	man	NOM	PST.AV.see	DAT	child
Translation: The man is the one who saw the child.
The man waited for a child (non-specific).

Primary text: ing	lalaki	ing	menakit	king	anak
Gloss: NOM	man	NOM	PST.AV.see	DAT	child
Translation: The man is the one who saw the child.
The man waited for a/the child.

Primary text: Dinatang	ne	ing	ipus	a	sumaup	kang	Ara
Gloss: AV:arrived	COMP:3SG.NOM	NOM	servant	LK	AV:will.help	DAT	PN
Translation: The servant arrived who was going to help Ara.
Who hit you?
He is the one who saw the accident.
He is the one who saw a/the accident.
He is the one who saw Jose.
He is the one who saw me.

Primary text: Siya	ang	naka-kita	ng/*sa	kaniya-ng	asawa
Translation: He/She is the one who saw his/her spouse.

Primary text: Ito 	ang	pusa-ng	k<um>ain	ng	daga'.
Translation: This is the cat that ate a/the rat.

Primary text: Ito 	ang	pusa-ng	k<um>ain	sa	daga'.
Translation: This is the cat that ate the rat.
The teacher hit Roberto.
The teacher hit him/her.

Primary text: Nag-hatag	ang	maestra	sang	bola	sa	bata’
Gloss: AV.RLS-give	NOM	teacher	GEN	ball	DAT	child
Translation: The teacher gave a ball to the child.
I hugged the professor.

Primary text: Ne	omin	le	t<m>udà	ke	Was
Translation: And then they threw Monkey out.
Please fetch some water for us.
And then they burnt that house.
He/She will be the one to teach me.

Primary text: Isé	nto	sumúq	nanilow	si	tonaqas
Translation: He would be the one to enter (Kinilow) and look for the shaman.
‘(He) beckoned me over.
I chased Rabe.
He chased me.

Primary text: Manao	(*an)	farafra	mahafinaritra	io	mpandrafirtra	io
Gloss: PRS.AV:make		bed	pleasing	DET	carpenter	DEM
Translation: That carpenter makes pleasing beds.
Rasoa is watching this dog.

Primary text: Tsy	mahalala	an	io	olona	io	aho
Gloss: NEG	PRS.AV:know	DAT	DET	person	DEM	1SG
Translation: I don’t know that person.

Primary text: Kadung	aa	kou	pendakod	dogon,	tibas-on	tekoo
Translation: If you don’t let me climb up there, I’ll slash you all to pieces!
I will split a coconut / some coconuts.

Primary text: Ontok	nopoh	dit	tanak	dot	[minonibas	dit	tidi	yoh]	…
Gloss: about	only	GEN	child	REL	 PST.AV.TR:slash	GEN	mother	3SG.GEN	…
Translation: As for the son who slashed (i.e. murdered) his mother, …

Primary text: Waro	noh	tulun	sirih	[dot	sinumambat	di	Majabou]
Gloss: exist	FOC	person	ANAPH.LOC	REL	PST.AV:meet	GEN	Majabou
Translation: There were people there who met Majabou …
They flicked the child.
Utu kicked me.
I slapped John.
Narti is waiting for me.
Narti is waiting for me.
I saw the teacher earlier (today).
The teacher saw me earlier today.
This is my pen.
Concerning that letter, I haven’t received it yet.

Primary text: sebuah	lagu	yang	barangkali	saudara	akan	menyukai=nya
Gloss: one:CLF	song	REL	apparently	sibling	will	AV:like:APPL=3SG.GEN
